Title: Passenger Jet
Description:
Original description: Seems like the aliens have hijacked a passenger jet. Basically Duke must clear the aircraft of all aliens. It is suspected that power on the aircraft has been paritally destroyed, therefore duke must activate backup power and make his way to the cockpit to hit. The following map was apart of the Duke is 007 TC until it fell through
early 1999. Several maps have been released to show the people what they were expecting to see.

Original author: Jason Bredhauer

I am not the author of this map and if the owner wants it removed then they only need to get in contact.
